inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes >1 year prior to consent date
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age 7-17 years at the initiation of the system
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Multiple Daily Injections (Basal Bolus therapy) with Total daily insulin use of great than 8.0 units per day over a 1-week period
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Will be able to download information into the Medtronic CareLink software
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinically able to start the AHCL system
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of 3 clinic visits in the last year
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of type 1 diabetes is based on the investigator's judgment; C peptide level and antibody determinations are not required
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Shortness of breath and fatigue during activities
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with cardiomyopathy that will be treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: DKA in the 6 months prior to screening visit
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Untreated diabetes retinopathy, or other causes that ,in the investigator's opinion, precludes the individual from participating in the trial.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes and is willing to download information into the Medtronic CareLink software. However, they are diagnosed with cardiomyopathy which may be a contraindication for participation.
